Text: Bedankt! Ik keek hier erg naar uit.

("When a monkey nibbles on a penis

and
Ken Jeong
("That little monkey snorting coke with me

Funny Dialogs;
"Oh, you're having a bad day! Did you die?
- I got shot!
- But did you die?"

"You ruined my life!
You're not my friend!
Don't say that, Phil! You're serious?
Even in America?"
Great Comedy, great Cast!

The revealing Pictures at the end are as good as the entire movie.

Thanks NLUPPER.
